grantOptionalParams.description: Spectrum Grant parameters provided by a CBSD

measReport.description: Measurement report provided by a CBSD.

___rcvdPowerMeasReports.description: Report structured used by a CBSD when a measurement report type is EutraCarrierRssiNonTx or EutraCarrierRssiAlways

items.description: Report for a particular Carrier RSSI measurement.

___measBandwidth.description: Measurement bandwidth of the channel in Hz.

___measFrequency.description: Frequency of the low end of the measured channel in Hz.

___measRcvdPower.description: Carrier RSSI measurement of the channel in dBm as per 3GPP TS 32.592.

operationParam.description: Operational parameters provided for a CBSD

___operationFrequencyRange.description: Describes a frequency range. The range is provided as a pair of numbers which describe the bounding values of the range.

___lowFrequency.description: The lower frequency of the range in Hz.

___highFrequency.description: The higher frequency of the range in Hz. Must be greater than lowFrequency.

___maxEirp.description: The peak operating power in dBm/MHz to be used by the CBSD within this operating parameter set

___cbsdId.description: Unique designator for the CBSD as returned from the registration procedure.
